    • Method Detail

      • onSessionNew

        void onSessionNew(ServerSession.SessionKey sesKey,
                java.lang.String srcIP)
        This event is triggered when a request for a new session arrives from Client.
        Parameters:
        sesKey - - SessionKey. Contains long (id of the session) and String (uri of the session) Needs to be passed to ServerSession c-tor.
        srcIP - - IP of the Client
